channel.title: Zero Degrees Kelvin
channel.description: Recent content on Zero Degrees Kelvin

item.title: Who Am I?
item.description: I am a software professional and leader who often finds myself drawing analogies with the non-software world. I like to use these as a tool to both remember and explain my ideas in non-technical terms which I find helps level the playing field when dealing with audiences with mixed levels of technical knowledge. The name of this blog is one such analogy. We can never reach zero degrees Kelvin but it still exists.
